name: Powerup Platformer
description:
Overview
Run, jump and avoid traps as you try to reach the end of each level. Collect powerups that duplicate your player. The clone has the powerup effects and is not real, so it disappears after a few a seconds, so use it fast. Use these powerups to help beat the level.

Theme
This game relates to the theme: It is not real, by including powerups that create extra player characters are not real.

Controls

  • AD / Arrows - Movement 
  • W / Space  - Jump
  • Shift - Crouch
  • Esc - Pause

Credits
Music: Twin Musicom
